1662.16.text: their support, their...things like their network

1667.08.text: and things where you can go along and meet other people with alopecia

1670.12.text: and try to just make some people's lives a bit easier.

1672.44.text: Cos it's quite a tough thing to go through, I guess.

1675.60.text:
- Well, we are glad that we are a part of that. 
- Absolutely.

1678.68.text: But that's an absolutely decisive victory, well done.

1681.28.text: And a famous one too after all this time they've been sitting there

1688.92.text: The charity gets the money and we are delighted by that.

1691.44.text: You are officially cleverer than the Eggheads.

1695.32.text: You've proved that they can be beaten. Do join us next time.

1698.92.text: I can't promise a game as good as this one, this was amazing,

1701.68.text: but join us on Eggheads next time to see

1703.84.text: if a new team of Challengers will be just as successful.
